original_title: Parliament votes to remove Sri Lanka’s Public Utilities Chief
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The resolution to remove Janaka Ratnayake from the post of Chairman and Member of the Public Utilities Commission was passed in Parliament on Wednesday (24).
South Asia’s fastest man Yupun placed 2nd at Savona International
Sri Lanka expects FDI to jump to $1.3 bn with India taking lead
